title: How To Fill the Open Source Cracks in Your Container Foundation
author: Vicki Walker
description: CVEs in open source components fueling your containers not only create security threats but also stall developer productivity. Learn how to fortify the foundation of your software.
cntitle: 如何填补容器基础架构中的开源裂缝
cndescription: 开源组件中的 CVE 不仅会给你的容器带来安全威胁，还会降低开发者的生产力。 了解如何加强软件的基础。
